                  br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.object2d.TransitionControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Layout
public class TransitionControl
extends FixedObject

A TransitionControl object is an arrow pointing either to the right or left, moving the camera to the specified direction in a BattleScreen. It has been replaced by the A-D and arrow keys and scrolling on the Map2D due to usability decisions and currently is being used for advancing the story in a SceneScreen.
